title: [Mc1.8][2b]ArmorStand简便制作茶几(单指令生成平面)
txt_content:
本帖最后由 贰逼 于 2014-12-17 21:30 编辑 

今天无聊把原来的弃坑项目发过来了。





2014-12-17_20.19.36.png (182.45 KB, 下载次数: 32)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:05 上传





这便是接下来教程中所出现的两种茶几（一个是单腿，另一个双腿）

9*9平面生成：




2014-12-17_21.02.30.png (45.41 KB, 下载次数: 21)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:08 上传






生成这样一个缩小方块除了利用滤器：
http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-332808-1-1.html
批量缩小方块

还有手动指令，便于逻辑组执行
通过拼接，以下为各个缩小方块的相对坐标生成指令：
/summon ArmorStand ~0.65 ~-0.2 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:carpet"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}

/summon ArmorStand ~1.03 ~-0.2 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:carpet"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}

/summon ArmorStand ~0.27 ~-0.2 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:carpet"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}

/summon ArmorStand ~0.65 ~-0.2 ~0.18 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:carpet"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}复制代码
通过http://www.mcbbs.net/thread-344453-1-1.html的方法单挑指令执行多条指令，折合为一个核心指令：
/summon MinecartCommandBlock ~ ~4 ~-0.1 
{Command:"/kill@e[type=MinecartCommandBlock,r=8]",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/kill @e[type=Item,r=7]",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:" /summon ArmorStand ~0.65 ~0.8 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:171},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:" /summon ArmorStand ~1.03 ~0.8 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:171},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:" /summon ArmorStand ~0.27 ~0.8 ~-0.59 {Equipment:[{id:171},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:" /summon ArmorStand ~0.27 ~0.8 ~-0.2 {Equipment:[{id:171},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}",Riding:

{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:" /summon ArmorStand ~1.03 ~0.8 ~0.17 {Equipment:[{id:171},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[346.0F,44.3F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,DisabledSlots:2069869,ShowArms:0b,Small:0b}",Riding:

{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/kill @e[type=Item,r=7]",Riding:
{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~ ~-1 minecraft:lava 7 replace",Riding:
{id:"FallingSand",Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Riding:
{id:"FallingSand",Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Time:1,Riding:
{id:"Item",Motion:[0.0,0.0,-0.1],Age:5996}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}}复制代码也就是执行上面的九条指令。
（组直接的方式可以用word文档将里面出现的171改成其他id）


制作茶几：




2014-12-17_20.51.06.png (61.32 KB, 下载次数: 29)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:05 上传






首先用上面的单指令生成平面





2014-12-17_20.51.25.png (159.46 KB, 下载次数: 27)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:05 上传






生成的平面ArmorStand（未隐身，便于操作）





2014-12-17_20.52.38.png (93.24 KB, 下载次数: 22)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:06 上传






用fill填充指令方块上面第二个方块，平面下方的方块一个2*3的平面


单腿：




2014-12-17_20.53.13.png (88.14 KB, 下载次数: 30)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:03 上传






破坏原来的多条指令，在如图位置放上这两个指令方块：
黑：
/summon ArmorStand ~0.4 ~1.25 ~0.25 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码
白：
/summon ArmorStand ~0.4 ~1.9 ~0.25 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码
通过相对坐标在平面中心生成不同高度生成两个腿





2014-12-17_20.53.21.png (83.07 KB, 下载次数: 27)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:03 上传






成品

破坏原来的多条指令，在如图位置放上这四个指令方块：
红
/summon ArmorStand ~0.9 ~1.2 ~-0.7 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码
黄
/summon ArmorStand ~0.9 ~1.9 ~-0.7 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码
蓝
/summon ArmorStand ~0.9 ~1.2 ~-0.7 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码
绿
/summon ArmorStand ~0.9 ~1.9 ~-0.7 {Equipment:[{id:"minecraft:fence"},{},{},{},{}],Pose:{Body:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightArm:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F],LeftLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],RightLeg:[270.0F,0.0F,0.0F],Head:[0.0F,0.0F,0.0F]},NoGravity:1b,NoBasePlate:1b,Invisible:0b,DisabledSlots:1973790,ShowArms:1b,Small:0b}复制代码通过相对坐标在平面两边生成不同高度各生成两个腿





2014-12-17_20.56.54.png (108.39 KB, 下载次数: 24)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:06 上传






成品


最后工作：
/entitydata @e[type=ArmorStand,r=2] {Invisible:1}复制代码玩家站在实体堆中间，一条指令让装备家隐身




2014-12-17_20.57.48.png (51.92 KB, 下载次数: 27)

下载附件

2014-12-17 21:06 上传






完工!

本帖仅作教程与展示使用

replies.author: paopaocui泡泡
replies.txt_content: 哎。。   每次看到这些指令都吓尿。。

replies.author: 乾.坤
replies.txt_content: 厉害！！

replies.author: C-青皮君
replies.txt_content:
简直坑爹,2b由来水技巧版！
遣送佛山洗脚！

replies.author: RAY5DHao
replies.txt_content:
现在很流行一条指令拯救世界么...
看来我要好好学一下了...

replies.author: 修改器很好玩
replies.txt_content:
本帖最后由 修改器很好玩 于 2014-12-17 21:48 编辑 

这个帖子里面的所有代码扼杀了我的全部想象力，以至于我成为中国式教育的受害者之一。


Edit：你也知道，过度的心理压力以及功课，会导致人的视力下降、想象力被扼杀、思想被局限化。看完这个代码之后，我的全部世界观都心碎了，仿佛每一个字母都上着我的心，再看这些代码之前，我还是一名有创意的Cinema 4d动画渲染学习者，看完代码，我的一切灵感，想象力全部已瞬间被扼杀。我的人生也没了，我以为MC是一个让人“脑洞大开”的游戏，没有想到，一段代码，就能把一个人毁掉。我多么后悔我点了这个帖子，求求版主赶紧把这个帖子删掉，以免害更多人。


Edit 2：警告大家：过度的代码伤身体，请不要尝试去阅读命令方块的代码。尤其是那种带有NBT，summon，这类的东西......


Edit 3：我刚才竟然作死把代码读完了，而，我的心全部破碎掉了。我去医院检查了一下视力，他们说因为我读了太多代码，眼睛得了癌症，不就就会失明。啊！请大家珍惜拥有光明的时刻，我大约还有3天14小时23分钟42秒就要瞎了，请大家为我祈祷。
@贰逼 



以上内容纯属娱乐，情不要当真。我只是开一个玩笑而已。
